r.s: PHP implementation of the XML-RPC protocol
r.d:
A PEAR-ified version of Useful Inc's XML-RPC for PHP.
It has support for HTTP/HTTPS transport, proxies and authentication.
r.n: * Change ereg functions to preg due to deprecation (Request 17546 and then some.) * Fix bugs in XML_RPC_Dump error detection process. * Escape XML special characters in key names of struct elements. Bug 17368.
